trans-unit.source: Animates the value of a <see cref="T:System.Single" /> property along a set of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 根据一组 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames" /> 对 <see cref="T:System.Single" /> 属性的值进行动画处理。

trans-unit.source: A key frame animation's target values are defined by its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A> property, which contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame> objects.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧动画的目标值由定义其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A>属性，其中包含一套<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame>对象。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame> defines a segment of the animation with its own target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.Value%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame>定义与其自己目标动画段<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.Value%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When the animation runs, it progresses from one key value to the next at the specified key times.
trans-unit.target: 动画运行时，它从进展一个键值为在指定下一步键次。

trans-unit.source: There are three types of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame> classes, one for each supported interpolation method: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearSingleKeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteSingleKeyFrame>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineSingleKeyFrame>.
trans-unit.target: 有三种类型的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame>类，一个用于每个受支持的内插方法： <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearSingleKeyFrame>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteSingleKeyFrame>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineSingleKeyFrame>。

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimation>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> can have more than two of target values.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimation>、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames>可有多个两个目标值。

trans-unit.source: You can also control the interpolation method of individual <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame> segments.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以控制个人的内插方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame>段。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The object to be added as the child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 要作为此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的子项添加的对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame" /> to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 向此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 添加子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame" />。

trans-unit.source: This method allows <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame> objects to be direct children of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> object in markup.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame>要成为对象的直接子级<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames>标记中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The parameter <paramref name="child" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 参数 <paramref name="child" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame" />。

trans-unit.source: The text added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 添加到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的文本。

trans-unit.source: Adds a text string as a child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 将文本字符串添加为此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的子级。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> does not accept text as a child, so this method will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames>不接受文本为子级，因此此方法将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>除非派生的类已重写允许添加文本的行为。

trans-unit.source: A derived class has not overridden the default behavior, which does not allow text to be added.
trans-unit.target: 一个尚未重写默认行为（默认行为不允许添加文本）的派生类。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> to clone.
trans-unit.target: 要克隆的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a deep copy of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 使此实例成为指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的深层副本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> to clone.
trans-unit.target: 要克隆的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a modifiable deep copy of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> using current property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用当前的属性值使该实例成为指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的可修改深层副本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to check if this instance can be frozen; <see langword="false" /> to freeze this instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 <see langword="true" />，则检查是否可冻结该实例；如果是 <see langword="false" />，则冻结该实例。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> object unmodifiable or determines whether it can be made unmodifiable.
trans-unit.target: 使此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 对象的实例成为不可修改的，或确定是否可使其成为不可修改的。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="isChecking" /> is <see langword="true" />, this method returns <see langword="true" /> if this instance can be made read-only, or <see langword="false" /> if it cannot be made read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="isChecking" /> 为 <see langword="true" />，则该方法将在可使该实例为只读的情况下返回 <see langword="true" />，而在其他情况下返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="isChecking" /> is <see langword="false" />, this method returns <see langword="true" /> if this instance is now read-only, or <see langword="false" /> if it cannot be made read-only, with the side effect of having begun to change the frozen status of this object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="isChecking" /> 为 <see langword="false" />，则该方法将在该实例目前为只读的情况下返回 <see langword="true" />，而在其他情况下返回 <see langword="false" />，并且其副作用是已开始更改该对象的冻结状态。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> object to clone.
trans-unit.target: 要克隆的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使该实例成为指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 对象的复本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果这些属性包含资源引用或数据绑定<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>将失败时尝试冻结该对象，并将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建当前对象的冻结的副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> to copy and freeze.
trans-unit.target: 要复制和冻结的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 使该实例成为指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的冻结复本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建当前对象的冻结的副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.
trans-unit.target: 建议使用的原始值。如果动画没有自己显式设置的起始值，则使用该值。

trans-unit.source: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.
trans-unit.target: 建议使用的目标值。如果动画没有自己显式设置的结束值，则使用该值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" /> that generates the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> used by the host animation.
trans-unit.target: 用于生成宿主动画使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" />。

trans-unit.source: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 计算一个值，该值表示正在进行动画处理的属性的当前值，该值由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的实例确定。

trans-unit.source: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 计算得出的属性值，该值由当前实例确定。

trans-unit.source: If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> that is not <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一个组合链中此值将为快照值 （如果有的话） 或基属性值; 否则此值将为返回链中的上一个动画的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>不 <c4 1> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A> 。

trans-unit.source: The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.
trans-unit.target: `defaultDestinationValue`是基本值，如果动画在动画的属性上的第一个组合层，则; 否则值为前一的组合图层的属性的动画的输出值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> whose natural duration is desired.
trans-unit.target: 具有所需自然持续时间的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" />。

trans-unit.source: Provide a custom natural <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> property is set to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 属性设置为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 时，可提供自定义的自然 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />。

trans-unit.source: If the last key frame of this animation is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" />, then this value is used as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration" />; otherwise it will be one second.
trans-unit.target: 如果此动画的最后一个关键帧是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" />，则该值将用作 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration" />；否则将为 1 秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the animation's output value is added to the base value of the property being animated.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定动画的输出值是否添加到正进行动画处理的属性的基值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the animation adds its output value to the base value of the property being animated instead of replacing it; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果动画将其输出值添加到正进行动画处理的属性的基值，而不是将其替换，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定动画重复时是否累计该动画的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the animation accumulates its values when its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> property causes it to repeat its simple duration; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果动画在其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> 属性使其简单重复时累计它的值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the animation's output values only accumulate when the animation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A> property causes it to repeat its simple duration.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，该动画的输出时，值仅累计该动画的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A>属性使其重复播放其简单持续时间。

trans-unit.source: It does not accumulate its values when it restarts because its parent repeated or because its clock was restarted from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 它不会不会累计其值，因为其父重复重新启动时，或因为其时钟已重新启动从<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame" /> objects that define the animation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于定义动画的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame" /> objects that define the animation.
trans-unit.target: 用于定义动画的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrameCollection.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrameCollection.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Called when the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> object is modified.
trans-unit.target: 修改当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 对象时调用。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames" /> property of this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> should be value-serialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames" /> 的此实例的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 属性值应是经过序列化的值，则将返回 true。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应对该属性值进行序列化，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的子对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: 添加子对象。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到对象的文本。

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 将节点的文本内容添加到对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an ordered collection P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames associated with this animation sequence.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此动画序列相关联的有序集合 P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /><see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames" />的 。
